Original meaning 本义: Meaning noisy.

English senses 英语理解: quarrel; dispute hotly

Usage example 用法举例: 鬧劇 nào jù （farce)

閙字的基本解释

閙
nào
古同“闹”。

閙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［nào］
［《廣韻》奴教切，去效，娘。］
“闹1”的繁体字。亦作“閙1”。
(1)喧哗；不静。
(2)争吵；吵闹。
(3)扰乱。
(4)簇聚；攒聚。
(5)繁盛；旺盛。
(6)发生。多用于指不好的事情。
(7)发泄；排泄。
(8)犹搞，干。
(9)杂，不纯。参见“鬧銀”。
(10)用毒药毒。
(11)指有毒的。参见“鬧香”。

閙字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【門字部】　閙； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1333第13
【廣韻】奴敎切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】女敎切，?音橈。【集韻】擾也。【韻會】不靜也，喧囂也。又猥也。　【廣韻】同?。【集韻】或作?。【正韻】从鬥从市，鬥音鬭。俗作閙，从門，誤。

閙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［nào］
["Guangyun" slave teaches cut, to effect, mother. ]
Traditional characters for "闹1". Also known as "閙1".
(1) Noisy; no silence.
(2) Quarrel; noisy.
(3) Disturbance.
(4) Cluster; gather together.
(5) Prosperous; exuberant.
(6) Occurrence. Used to refer to bad things.
(7) Vent; excretion.
(8) Still doing it, doing it.
(9) Miscellaneous, impure. See "noisy silver".
(10) Poison with poison.
(11) Refers to poisonous. See "Fragrance".
閙

[Xu Ji 1] [Men Zi Department] 　閙; Kangxi strokes: 13; page number: page 1333 page 13
[Guangyun] Slave cuts [Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun] Female cuts, "Yin Radius". [Ji Yun] Disturbance. [Rhyme Meeting] It’s not quiet, it’s noisy. It's also wretched.　【Guangyun】Same as?. [Ji Yun] Or make?. [Zheng Yun] Cong Dou Cong City, Dou Yin Wu. Vulgar Zuohe, from the door, wrong.
